name: hikoo-ui
description: A static asset version of the hikoo.us ui

scripts.watch: concurrent --kill-others --prefix command --prefix-length 50 "npm run watch-css" "npm run watch-js"
scripts.prestart: npm run lint && rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist
scripts.server: eslint ./src/js/* && concurrent --kill-others --prefix command --prefix-length 50 "npm run watch-css" "npm run beefy"
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.start: npm run reinstall && npm run build-css && npm run server
